about_the_game:
Experience the second chapter in the newest cult-hit episodic horror, The Suits Have Gone Mad! After stumbling across color, Theo Blue sets out to retrieve the presentation that caused the Suits to turn against him.



Theo is no longer safe within the confines of Blake & Whitley Innovations. The company-wide manhunt will make his journey difficult as he tries to locate the presentation that has been seized.




Delve deeper into the floors of the company. Explore and uncover more of the various branches, facilities, and functioning systems within Blake & Whitley Innovations.




Sneak past patrolling suits or outlast lockdown. The Suits are determined to hunt you down.




Gain inspiration points. Use them to modify your suit and gain an advantage against the unwavering onslaught of Suits.




Continue to discover more about the company's culture and history. Why are the Suits unusually determined to stop you?
